text: Danza (foaled April 17, 2011 ) is an American Thoroughbred racehorse who won the 2014 Arkansas Derby. ==Career== On July 12, 2013, Danza competed in and won his first race at Belmont Park. Danza would not see victory again until April 12, 2014, at the Grade 1 2014 Arkansas Derby. Danza's last race took place on May 3, 2014 when he came in 3rd at the 2014 Kentucky Derby. ==Pedigree== ==References== Category:2011 racehorse births Category:Racehorses bred in Kentucky Category:Racehorses trained in the United States Category:Thoroughbred family 8-d
title: Danza (horse)
